item.title: When Data Flows Free: An EU Transformation
item.description: My journey with the EU Data Act began during a fascinating conversation with a colleague at a large automotive company. His deep expertise in automotive regulations sparked my curiosity about how this groundbreaking legislation would reshape our industry. As a software architect, I couldn’t help but dive deeper.
